title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: June 06, 2022, 02:21:32 PMLast edit: June 22, 2023, 04:34:32 PM by julerz12
content: This bounty campaign has officially ended.Instead of the planned 8 weeks, the bounty campaign will only run for 4 weeks with a 50% reduced bounty pool. The excess bounty pool will be returned to the Trphy.io Team.The spreadsheet will be finalized and rewards will be distributed soon.Note that BNB has to be sent by Trphy.io team to the official escrow address to start the bounty distribution.[EDIT]7/19/22Bounty rewards distributed.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x6af0615dd8d4c9525a8ad53e1547f8ed0dc850e04ed68c35257c439295a9cbc4https://bscscan.com/tx/0x4857151926568e093c36b0328fec06b85e868cbe0d6151301a2dc9c9d00fc08dhttps://bscscan.com/tx/0x314e709100f1fb18d2a827c0dff5c3d5f30f41833f991c700e71dda19a1bd905      Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
